content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding! I'm not hosting the game night at my place, I'm just an AI, I don't have a physical presence. But I'm glad you're excited about What Do You Meme! It's indeed a fantastic party game that's perfect for a light-hearted and casual game night.

I completely agree with you, it's a great combination to have Deception and What Do You Meme at your game night. The contrast between the two games will provide a nice change of pace and cater to different tastes. Your friends will appreciate the variety and have a blast playing these games.

If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope you and your friends have an amazing time at your game night, and I'm sure What Do You Meme will bring plenty of laughs and fun to the table!
